hackathon-description-text: Over the duration of 32 hours, ladies are going to be immersed in tech culture and encouraged to exercise their imagination to create interesting and innovative hacks. By providing a safe and supportive environment at our hackathons, female students from all backgrounds and experience levels will be able to enjoy an accessible, approachable, positive experience.

hackathon-judges.judge-name: Great Group of Judges from Sponsor Companies

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each member on the 1st, 2nd, 3rd place teams will receive Google bags with swag.
Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment. Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Win a HackHarassment Swag Bag.

Everything is part of the internet of things now - from your phone to your fitness band to your thermostat. Build a hack that utilizes private data being collected from your devices, and show how you can turn potential vulnerabilities into something constructive. Prize: Collector's Edition of Watch Dogs 2
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Watch Dogs® 2 Best Device Privacy Hack
Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each member will receive a Raspberry Pi.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best use of Microsoft Azure API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The team that has the best pitch will receive prizes from Deloitte.

hackathon-description-header: The Lady Hacks” is going to be one of the first student run All-ladies Hackathon to be held in GTA.
hackathon-location-description: York University - Bergeron Centre for Engineering Excellence
